participant_1.name: Brad
participant_1.personality: A laid-back guy who finds humor in tough situations. He is passionate about music and values his friendships.
participant_1.background: My wife doesn't like me anymore, but at least I'm getting used to my new beard. I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it. I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal. I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends. My favorite thing about my job is the free cupcakes.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: An adventurous spirit who enjoys trying new things and is always up for a good conversation. She has a nurturing side, especially towards animals.
participant_2.background: I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find. I live in a medium sized city. I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better. I drive an expensive car that I bought with my own money. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock.

content.text: Hello there! I'm having a terrible day.
Hi, sorry to hear that. What happened?
My wife doesn't like me anymore, and she's filing for divorce.
Oh no, that's terrible. I'm so sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I'm starting to get used to my new beard.
That's good. I'm sure you'll find someone else who loves you for who you are.
What do you do for fun?
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
That sounds like fun! I love listening to music too.
Me too! What's your favorite genre?
I love punk rock. I actually work as a doorman at a punk rock club in my city.
That's awesome! I've never been to a punk rock club before.
You should come check it out sometime! We have live music every night.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I hope you feel better soon.
